channel.title: Getting Erorrs When Adding Shops To A 562 RSPS
channel.description:
Hi guys, i get a lot of errors after i tried to add a shop to my server. I did everything what's here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=435812.0
But when i open Shophandler.java, i see case 1 AND case 2 and then the break. In the link i see case 1 break, so maybe that's the source of my problem. Anyways, here's my log, i really hope somebody can help me out....
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hFGE8.png[/img]
Edit: I still get errors, but the shop does work. But now my next question is: how do i add another shop? I kinda know how, but do i have do everything all over again? But then i have like two 'cases 7' or does that doesn't matter?

item.title: Getting Erorrs When Adding Shops To A 562 RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Nerrion Nerrion
item.description:
@Nerrion wrote:

Okay, i will try some things tomorrow. Thanks for all your help, and quick answers.

Edit: Ok, i know everything now. Except how to change the prices of the items… anyone?

Ok, i changed the price in prices.cfg (server -> data), but nothing has changed in the actual shop. What is also changed, what the item codes. I added 1 number to all of them, and they’re all trimmed now. Just one little thing: i can’t buy ANYTHING from the skillcape shop… how on earth do i fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Erorrs When Adding Shops To A 562 RSPS

item.title: Getting Erorrs When Adding Shops To A 562 RSPS

@Nerrion wrote:

What is the Shop id? The id of the npc that sells it?

And when i fill in this, don’t i have to do something in Summonpackethandler and/or Shops.java?

Read full topic
